issue.title: [R] Gate parquet tests on snappy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15122](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15122). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To avoid needing to patch snappy in our install process, gate the tests/examples that touch snappy to prevent sanitizer errors.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15122?focusedCommentId=17461724) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11965
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11965>
